name: My Protista Kingdom - Virtual Ecosystem Simulation
name_original: My Protista Kingdom - Virtual Ecosystem Simulation
description:
A little, fun project I have been working on for 4 days. 

(PS, Some of the settings are broken, those parts came to the a little bit of a rush)

Controls

Well, there are no controls but you can press on the cell you want to spectate.

ESC - Reset the world

Stats Panel: Shows the Health, hunger, lifetime, growth and reproduction levels of the cellGenetic Panel: Shows the genetic characteristics of the cell, also genetics extends to children cells too 
Kingdom Panel: You can see all quantity values of entities on the world.

Behaviours

There are 3 diffrent main species in the simulation

Predator Cell: Eats Trasher and Herbivore cells, hunts only when hungry and has relatively slower stats. Can wipe entire ecosystem by mistake (whoops)

Herbivore Cell: Eats algaes and reproduces very fast, can dominate the ecosystem very easily if there isn't much predator factor. Main prey of the predators

Trasher: Well obviously from the name, eats trash. Can eat other cell's feces and meat when possible. Also dispenses algaes which is important for herbivore cell's living
